Which editors are you using?

May 5, 2009 â€¢ {"display_name"=>"Andreas Hartmann", "login"=>"andreas", "email"=>"andreas@apache.org"}

In order to decide which editors to focus on, the Lenya community has started a survey to find out which ones are actually in use. If you're using Lenya, please take a minute to add a line to the table on this Wiki page:

http://wiki.apache.org/lenya/whichEditors

Thank you very much!
